publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2635.1 John Scott: Scudamore Report into Foot and Mouth Disease—As an amendment to motion (S3M-2635) in the name of Richard Lochhead, insert at end "notes the continued economic impact of the outbreak on Scotland’s beef, sheep and pig farmers, and calls on the Scottish Government to address proactively the continuing decline in livestock numbers across Scotland."
